title: Excellent plot of land with panoramic view in Pussellawa on Nuwara Eliya Road
details:
This plot is located in an excellent location with a panoramic uninterrupted view of the hills and valleys and a
concrete road leads up to the land from Mount Royal Hotel, Pussellawa. Just 40 km from Nuwara Eliya, it also overlooks cascading waterfall over the rocks.
Water and Electricity connections are already available. Clear deed.
Cool climate throughout the year and a quiet neighbourhood make this an ideal location to build a residential house or a holiday bungalow.
